description: This file defines a Kotlin class `NotesDbHelper` that extends `SQLiteOpenHelper`. It manages creation, upgrading, and indexing of a notes database for an Android app, including table and column definitions.

classes.name: NotesDbHelper
classes.description: A helper class for managing the notes database, including creation and upgrade logic.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Creates the notes table and indexes in the database.

methods.name: onUpgrade
methods.description: Handles database upgrade by dropping and recreating the notes table.
